attributes.action: illegal air pollution: Restore our Human Rights to not have to breath chemtrail pollution
attributes.additional_details: Government is shielding the poisoning of our air by paying EASYJET and RYANAIR to spray chemtrails and allowing other aircraft to spray chemtrails across our skies forcing us to breathe and eat the poisons. This must stop. They are now trying to imitate more natural clouds - SINISTER!

rejection.details: There are several petitions from the creator on this subject.
